doc.after: Albania, officially the Republic of Albania (Albanian Republika e ShqipÃ«risÃ« [É¾ÉËpublika É ÊcipÉËÉ¾iËs], or simply ShqipÃ«ria) is a country in Southeastern Europe. Albania is bordered by Kosovo to the northeast, the Republic of Macedonia to the east, Greece to the south-east, and Montenegro to the north. It has a coast on the Adriatic Sea to the west, and on the Ionian Sea to the southwest. From the Strait of Otranto, Albania is less than 100 km (60 miles) from Italy.
